basics.name: namePrefix
basics.label: Resource prefix
basics.toolTip: String used as a base for naming resources (4 alphanumeric characters or less).  A unique hash is prepended to the string for some resources, while resource-specific information is appended.

constraints.validationMessage: Resource prefix must be between 2 and 4 characters long, must begin with a lowercase letter, and can contain only numbers and lowercase letters.

basics.name: adminUsername
basics.label: VM user name
basics.toolTip: Admin username for all of the deployed virtual machines.

toolTip.authenticationType: Authentication type for the admin user
toolTip.password: VM password must be 12 characters and have 3 of the following: 1 lower case character, 1 upper case character, 1 number, and 1 special character.

elements.name: regionCnt
elements.label: Number of region(s)
elements.toolTip: Select the number of region(s) to deploy virtual machines into.

subLabel.preValidation: Define the number and size and nodes in the network

elements.name: consortiumMemberIdValue
elements.label: Consortium Member Id
elements.toolTip: The Id associated with each member participating in the consortium network.  Member Id should be unique across different members in the same network.

elements.name: numberOfMiningNodes
elements.label: Number of mining nodes
elements.toolTip: Mining nodes record transactions within a blockchain network.  Choose the number of nodes that meet your availability and security requirements.

elements.name: mnStoragePerformance
elements.label: Mining node storage performance
elements.toolTip: Managed Disks is an abstraction of current Standard and Premium storage disk in Azure Storage. You only need to specify the type (Standard or Premium) you need, in your selected Azure region, and Azure will create and manage the Disk accordingly.

elements.name: numTXNodes
elements.label: Number of load balanced transaction nodes
elements.toolTip: An application or user interacts with a load balanced set of transaction nodes to submit transactions to the network.  Choose the number of nodes that meets your availability requirements.

elements.name: txStoragePerformance
elements.label: Transaction node storage performance
elements.toolTip: Managed Disks is an abstraction of current Standard and Premium storage disk in Azure Storage. You only need to specify the type (Standard or Premium) you need, in your selected Azure region, and Azure will create and manage the Disk accordingly.

elements.name: consortiumInformation
elements.label: Consortium Data Url
elements.toolTip: The URL pointing to the consortium configuration data provided by another member's deployment

elements.name: consortiumMemberGateway
elements.label: VNet Gateway to Connect to
elements.toolTip: Resource Id of the Virtual Network Gateway to connect to

elements.name: ethereumAccountPsswd
elements.toolTip: Password used to secure the default Ethereum account that will be generated.

constraints.validationMessage: Password must be 12 characters or more with a minimum of 1 lower case, 1 upper case and one number. Double quotes are not allowed.

elements.name: ethereumAccountPassphrase
elements.toolTip: Passphrase used to generate the private key associated with the default Ethereum account that is generated.  Consider a passphrase with sufficient randomness to ensure a strong private key.

constraints.validationMessage: Password must be 12 characters or more with a minimum of 1 lower case, 1 upper case and one number. Double quotes are not allowed.

elements.name: connectionSharedKey
elements.label: Shared Key for Connection
elements.toolTip: A mixture of letters and numbers, used to establish encryption for the connection.  The same shared key must be used in both the virtual network gateways

constraints.validationMessage: Must only be letters and numbers between 1 and 128 characters.

elements.name: peerInfoEndpoint
elements.label: Endpoint of Peer information registrar
elements.toolTip: Endpoint of Peer information registrar provided by member's deployment.

elements.name: peerInfoKey
elements.label: Key of Peer information registrar
elements.toolTip: Key of Peer information registrar provided by member's deployment.
